item.title: Meta-Controller: Few-Shot Imitation of Unseen Embodiments and Tasks in Continuous Control
item.description: Meta-Controller: A novel few-shot behavior cloning framework enables robots to generalize to unseen embodiments and tasks using only a few reward-free demonstrations, showcasing superior few-shot gene…
